SEARCH
Module app
Package app

Class PlayerController

java.lang.Object
app.PlayerController
public class PlayerController extends Object

Represents the will of the human player. All input and output for one player is handled here.
Also holds relevant information about the player, such as his name, his affection, his cards, etc.

      Parameters:

      command - Command to execute.
      Returns:
      True if the player has ended his turn, false otherwise.

    • isKnockedOut

      public boolean isKnockedOut()
      Returns:
      True if the player is knocked out, false otherwise.

    • setIsKnockedOut

      public void setIsKnockedOut(boolean bIsKnockedOut, boolean bSignalPlayerNextTurn, String messageForPlayer)

      If bIsKnockedOut is True, we will automatically discard all the player's cards as it is stated in the rules.

      Parameters:
      bIsKnockedOut - True if the player is knocked out, false otherwise.
      bSignalPlayerNextTurn - True, if the player should be notified about his knockout at the beginning of his next turn, false otherwise.
      messageForPlayer - The message that should be displayed to the player at the beginning of his next turn (requires bSignalPlayerNextTurn to be True).

    • isSignalPlayerNextTurnAboutKnockout

      public boolean isSignalPlayerNextTurnAboutKnockout()
      Returns:
      If the player should be notified about his knockout at the beginning of his next turn.

    • setMessageForPlayerWhenPlayEffectWasForced

      public void setMessageForPlayerWhenPlayEffectWasForced(String messageForPlayerWhenPlayEffectWasForced)
      Parameters:
      messageForPlayerWhenPlayEffectWasForced - The message that should be displayed to the player at the beginning of his next turn if his card changed (requires bSignalPlayerNextTurn to be True).
      See Also:
      • setIsKnockedOut(boolean bIsKnockedOut, boolean bSignalPlayerNextTurn, String messageForPlayer)

    • isProtectedByHandmaid

      public boolean isProtectedByHandmaid()
      Returns:
      True, if the player is untouchable by any other effect, false otherwise.

    • setProtectedByHandmaid

      public void setProtectedByHandmaid(boolean bProtectedByHandmaid)
      Parameters:
      bProtectedByHandmaid - True, if the player should be untouchable by any other effect, false otherwise.

    • hasCountessWilhelminaInHand

      public boolean hasCountessWilhelminaInHand()
      Returns:
      True if the player has the Countess Wilhelmina in his hand or as his picked card from the deck, false otherwise.
